Title: KeySimulator - VoiceCommander
Description: An XML-Configurable program that uses the Voice Recognition Engine included in Windows Vista that simulate keystrokes with voice commands, 99% managed code. Specially useful with games!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An XML-Configurable program that uses the Voice Recognition Engine included in Windows Vista that simulate keystrokes with voice commands, 99% managed code. Specially useful with games!
